title: Examen Final (Trimestre 2): Liderazgo y Estrategia Financiera

items.prompt: Which term describes a plan to ensure a business can continue operating during a disaster?
items.explanation: A BCP (Business Continuity Plan) is crucial for resilience in the financial sector.

items.prompt: Complete with emphasis: 'Not only ________ the audit reveal errors, but it also exposed fraud.'
items.explanation: Inversion for emphasis in the past: 'Not only did [subject] [verb]...'.

items.prompt: It is recommended that the firm ________ (diversify) its funding sources immediately.
items.explanation: The subjunctive mood 'diversify' follows the recommendation.

items.prompt: A 'Turnaround Strategy' is most appropriate when a company is:
options: At the peak of its growth
items.explanation: Turnarounds are intended to save companies from collapse.
